riceCooker.name: rice cooker
body1: If you don't clean the rice cooker, it may smell while keeping warm, so check it every day and clean it from time to time.
When washing rice, put it in a separate container to prevent scratches.
Replace Internal rubber packets every 1-3 years
body2: Using the automatic cleaning function of the rice cooker, remove the parts and clean them.
Clean with: Water + 1 tablespoon vinegar + automatic cleaning
After automatic cleaning is completed, disconnect the power plug to clean the parts and cool the main body.
Remove only the removable parts and wash them all (check the separable parts are indicated in the manual or on the rice cooker).
When washing, wash with a neutral detergent, soft sponge, water and finish with a dishcloth that has been drained.
If the yellow stain does not disappear, rub it with water on the magic block.
NEVER USE to clean inside of the rice cooker: Benzene, Thinner, Clorox, Chlorine Detergent
